DOC.brief_summary: The objective is to find genes which are responsible for the appearance of skin tumors (sCC, BCC) and it will be the basis for prediction of the disease and response to the treatment
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective, 1-arm, 500 participates above 18 age with skin tumor affliction sCC and BCC type.
DOC.criteria: patient that have sCC and BCC tumors above 18 years old below 18 years old pregnant women children or person without judgment ability
